Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In the latest news people of Australia are closely watching the Federal Budget as it nears announcement. Despite weaker economic growth Treasurer Jim Chalmers promises to invest heavily in clean energy and prioritize infrastructure projects to accelerate recovery from the pandemic. That being said two-thirds of GP clinics no longer provide bulk billing services and the Australian Medical Association is putting pressure on the government to address this issue. With the RBA minutes set to release the focus turns to the central bank's decision regarding the interest rate.
